title: Cannon to Mid Window Spycam
description: A good early round Spycam to see into Mid Window and get a good vantage point of any potential Ops early into the round.

title: A Lobby to Hall Spycam
description: A good early round Spycam to see enemies peeking Hall.

title: A Site Mid Doors Spycam
description: A good Spycam to see both angles into A Site.

title: Aggressive B Arcade Spy Cam
description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam for B Arcade from B Bench.

title: B Site Execute Spy Cam
description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam for B Site from B Main.

title: A Main Spawn Barrier Spy Cam
description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam that allows you to safely spot and tag enemy players peeking out of A Main toward the start of the round, while also leaving a Spy Cam that can be used to watch the flank.

title: Aggressive B Main Spawn Barrier Spy Cam
description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam that allows you to safely spot and tag enemy players peeking out of B Main toward the start of the round, while also leaving a Spy Cam that can be used to watch the flank.

title: Standard Flank Trapwires
description: Here are 3 Trapwires that you can use interchangeably to stop enemy players from freely flanking your team wherever they may be on the map.

title: Full Utility A Site Hold Setup
description: Here's a very effective full utility A Site Hold Setup.

title: Default B Site Trapwire + Cyber Cage Setup
description: Here's a Trapwire + Cyber Cage setup Default on B Site.

title: Simple Default A Site Trapwire Variation
description: Here's a simple default A Site / Mid Trapwire setup.

title: Front A Site Spycam + Cyber Cage Combo
description: This Spycam is simple to set up, but is often very difficult for enemy players to react to. The camera's placement creates the opportunity for you to tag at least one enemy, and then spray the tagged enemy through the cyber cage while their teammates react to shoot the camera.

title: Control A Link with this Cyber Cage + Spy Cam Combo
description: Be careful of enemy players playing right on the other side of the close wall to you when doing this setup.

title: C Site Flank Traps for B and A
description: Use these B and A flank traps when your team wants to take C Site.

title: Flexible Full Utility C + B Setup
description: Use this setup to lock down C Site, while allowing your team the ability to play off of your Trapwire placed at the B Main spawn barrier.

title: A Site + A Door Full Utility Setup
description: Use this setup to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through three separate key chokepoints on the map without being punished or delayed.

title: Hidden B Site Spy Cam with Simple Trapwire + Cage
B Site Hidden Spy Cam with Simple Trapwire + Cage
description: This is a very effective hidden Spy Cam with a simple Trapwire + Cyber Cage setup to capitalize off of the Spy Cam's position.

title: Standard B Site Execute Sky Smokes
description: Here are the default smokes for an B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

title: Early Round Mid Window Support / Info Denial Sky Smoke
description: Use this Sky Smoke to limit the options of Attackers in Mid, and create opportunities for your teammates in that area of the map.

title: A Site Retake Sky Smoke Placements
description: Use your smokes like this when retaking A Site. Follow hot the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Attacker's options.
